kyototycoon::RemoteDB

kyototycoon::RemoteDB Class Reference

Remote database. More...

#include <ktremotedb.h>

Detailed Description

Remote database.

Note:
This class is a concrete class to access remote database servers. This class can be inherited but overwriting methods is forbidden. Before every database operation, it is necessary to call the RemoteDB::open method in order to connect to a database server. To avoid resource starvation it is important to close every database file by the RemoteDB::close method when the connection is no longer in use.
